13.1.hd_quote: A role of openness in listening to others with affection.
13.1.behavioral_axis: Listens empathically and collects people's stories, naturally pulling others to share their experiences with affection.
13.1.shadow_axis: Offers superficial affection with hidden agendas, feels burdened by others who constantly seek them out.
13.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

13.2.hd_quote: Tolerance as the least offensive manifestation of bigotry.
13.2.behavioral_axis: Called out by others who assume they'll listen empathetically, develops discrimination through unwanted exposure to many voices.
13.2.shadow_axis: Becomes bitter and prejudiced from being forced to hear humanity's worthless stories, withdraws into intolerance.
13.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

13.3.hd_quote: The belief that what is best can never be achieved.
13.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial-and-error with who to listen to, becoming deeply suspicious and mistrusting of propaganda.
13.3.shadow_axis: Develops cruel satire as art form, says devastating things that humiliate others under guise of humor.
13.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

13.4.hd_quote: Openness which leads to exhaustion and the need for silence.
13.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes by actively going out to listen, collecting endlessly without pausing for reflection until exhaustion.
13.4.shadow_axis: Listens compulsively in fixed pattern until total collapse, unable to stop unless physically exhausted.
13.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

13.5.hd_quote: The ability to overcome all obstacles for the betterment of humanity.
13.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under projection field as others seek them to unburden, finding practical roles for people based on shared experience.
13.5.shadow_axis: Performs the savior role to satisfy projections, becomes deeply burdened by others' need to confess.
13.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

13.6.hd_quote: The ability to accept any limited interaction as a necessary step towards greater union.
13.6.behavioral_axis: Maintains hope for meaningful experience while becoming selective in maturity about who deserves their listening attention.
13.6.shadow_axis: Appears naive by translating personal commonality into universal expectations, presumed simple-minded by others.
13.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
